definition: of low birth or station (`base' is archaic in this sense), cause to feel shame
details:
adjective
- of low birth or station (`base' is archaic in this sense)
= synonyms: base
- marked by meekness or modesty
- used of unskilled work (especially domestic work)
= synonyms: lowly, menial
- low or inferior in station or quality
= example: low or inferior in station or quality
= synonyms: small
verb
- cause to feel shame
= synonyms: chagrin, mortify, humiliate, abase
- cause to be unpretentious
= example: cause to be unpretentious
